Name: Darkness Battle
About the game: Darkness Battle is a slasher in which you have to fight with the warriors of darkness. You will have to pass interesting levels in various locations, making your way through crowds of enemies. You will also have to fight in the arena. For all this, you can use medieval weapons. Features: -Exciting levels -Beautiful effects -Easy control -Realistic battles -Realistic damage system
